Text:
after defeating Dracula, Da Vinci sets out to kill the legendary Medusa

spoiler alert:

Da Vinci, Galileo and Archimedes team up in this episode by combining their powers they take the form of Mega Inventigor for they will need to work together if they plan to defeat legions of werewolves and imps in order to face Medusa! Knowing all the while the final boss Lucifer awaits them :)
